quotes.author: atticus
quotes.quote: The more I live, the more I see we are a forest full off wolves howling at the same moon thinking we are alone.

quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absense of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.
